page.title: 08CASTLE WARD SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: When I was at the Sports Centre,a man showed us around.His name was Mr.Atkinson.The man said that they play rugby,football and ride horses.There is a shop where you can buy shuttles,tenns balls and rackets.The Sports Centre was opened in 1967 and alterations were made in 1972.It is busy all year round rather than now and again.We asked him what the worst injury had been.He said that there had been broken limbs and sprains.He said that in the future they were wanting outside tennis courts and 2,2 air rifle shooting. The prices are Â£6 for adults, Â£3 a child to join for a year.They are open every day except Christmas Day.The man said that volleyball is popular.The opening time of the sports centre is 9.00am and the closing time is 11.00pm.
